LandingPage.schemaDescription: Campus2Career by Street2Ivy — Where Campus Meets Career.
LandingPage.title: Campus2Career — Where Campus Meets Career
LandingPage.description: Campus2Career is a matching and reputation engine connecting ambitious companies with high-performing college students. We match. You work. Both sides review.
LandingPage.hero.subtitle: Campus2Career by Street2Ivy is a matching and reputation engine. We connect ambitious companies with high-performing students for real project work — then both sides come back to review. No middleman. No platform lock-in. Just results and reputation.
LandingPage.how.label: The Process
LandingPage.how.title: How It Works
LandingPage.how.subtitle: Simple, transparent, and built for the way real work gets done.
LandingPage.how.companies.step1Desc: Define scope, timeline, and required skills. Our matching engine surfaces the best-fit candidates.
LandingPage.how.companies.step2Desc: Browse applications, review portfolios and reputation scores, and interview your top picks.
LandingPage.how.companies.step3Desc: Choose your student and connect directly. All work happens on your terms, off-platform.
LandingPage.how.companies.step4Desc: Collaborate using your own tools. Campus2Career doesn't manage, track, or own any of the work.
LandingPage.how.companies.step5Desc: Both sides return to leave honest reviews. This builds the reputation layer that makes the platform trustworthy.
LandingPage.how.students.step1Desc: Showcase your skills, experience, and portfolio. Let your work speak — not just your school name.
LandingPage.how.students.step2Desc: Find projects that match your skills and interests. Apply with one click and stand out with your track record.
LandingPage.how.students.step3Desc: Companies review your application and connect directly. No gatekeepers, no algorithms hiding you.
LandingPage.how.students.step4Desc: Deliver on your own terms. Your work stays yours — no proprietary platform, no data lock-in.
LandingPage.how.students.step5Desc: Both you and the company leave mandatory reviews. Your growing reputation unlocks better opportunities.
LandingPage.how.universities.step1Desc: Set up your institution's branded subdomain and configure student access in minutes.
LandingPage.how.universities.step2Desc: Invite students through your career services office. They get immediate access to the platform.
LandingPage.how.universities.step3Desc: Give every student 24/7 access to AI-powered resume review, interview prep, and career strategy.
LandingPage.how.universities.step4Desc: Real-time analytics dashboard shows student activity, project completions, and placement outcomes.
LandingPage.how.universities.step5Desc: Students graduate with real work experience, verified reviews, and employer connections — improving your placement metrics.
LandingPage.trust.label: Why We're Different
LandingPage.trust.title: Your Work Stays Yours
LandingPage.trust.subtitle: Campus2Career is a matching and reputation engine — not a work management platform. We connect you, then get out of the way.
LandingPage.trust.item1Desc: All work happens off-platform, using your own tools. No proprietary data, no legal friction, no platform lock-in.
LandingPage.trust.item2Desc: Mandatory two-sided reviews build a reputation that follows you. Better reviews unlock better opportunities.
LandingPage.trust.item3Desc: Once matched, you work directly with your partner. No middleman fees, no message routing, no artificial barriers.
LandingPage.trust.item4Desc: Every match ends with a review. Both sides are incentivized to do right by each other.
LandingPage.value.label: Built for Everyone
LandingPage.value.title: One Platform, Three Audiences
LandingPage.value.subtitle: Whether you're finding talent, building your career, or supporting students — Campus2Career was built for you.
LandingPage.value.companies.title: Flexible Talent, Zero Overhead
LandingPage.value.companies.desc: Access a curated pool of motivated, skilled students. Post a project, get matched, and work on your terms.
LandingPage.value.companies.feature1: Post projects and get matched in hours, not weeks
LandingPage.value.companies.feature2: Review candidate reputation scores before matching
LandingPage.value.companies.feature3: No platform fees on the work itself
LandingPage.value.companies.feature4: Convert top performers into full-time hires
LandingPage.value.students.title: Get Hired for What You Can Do
LandingPage.value.students.desc: Your school's name doesn't matter here. Your skills, your work, your reputation — that's what opens doors.
LandingPage.value.students.feature1: Build a verified portfolio with real company projects
LandingPage.value.students.feature2: Earn money while building your career
LandingPage.value.students.feature3: AI career coaching for resumes, interviews, and strategy
LandingPage.value.students.feature4: Your reputation grows with every completed project
LandingPage.value.universities.title: Elevate Your Career Services
LandingPage.value.universities.desc: Give your students access to real opportunities and AI-powered coaching without building new infrastructure.
LandingPage.value.universities.feature2: AI career coaching for every enrolled student
LandingPage.value.universities.feature3: Real-time analytics on engagement and outcomes
LandingPage.value.universities.feature4: Improve placement rates without hiring more staff
LandingPage.testimonials.title: What They're Saying
LandingPage.testimonial1.quote: We needed a competitive analysis done fast, and hiring a consultant would have cost 10x more. The student we matched with delivered insights our strategy team is still referencing six months later.
LandingPage.testimonial1.author: Michael Chen
LandingPage.testimonial1.role: VP of Strategy, Growth Ventures LLC
LandingPage.testimonial2.quote: I go to a state school nobody's heard of. Before Campus2Career, I couldn't even get interviews. Now I have three completed projects on my resume and a standing offer from a Series B startup.
LandingPage.testimonial2.author: Jasmine Rodriguez
LandingPage.testimonial3.quote: We rolled out Campus2Career across our business school last semester. Student engagement with career services jumped 40%, and we now have real data on which companies are hiring our graduates.
LandingPage.testimonial3.author: Dr. Patricia Howard
LandingPage.ai.label: AI Career Coaching
LandingPage.ai.title: Your Personal AI Career Coach, Available 24/7
LandingPage.ai.desc: Every Campus2Career student gets access to AI-powered career coaching that provides personalized guidance — from resume optimization to interview prep to long-term career strategy.
LandingPage.ai.feature1Desc: Get instant feedback to stand out in any application
LandingPage.ai.feature2Desc: Practice with AI-simulated coaching interviews tailored to your target roles
LandingPage.ai.feature3Desc: Map out your trajectory based on skills, interests, and market trends
LandingPage.ai.ctaBlocked: AI Career Coaching is available when your institution enables this feature. Contact your career services office for more information.
LandingPage.ai.chatMsg1: Hi Sarah! I reviewed your resume. Your data analysis experience is strong, but let's highlight your Python skills more prominently for fintech roles. Want me to suggest some rewrites?
LandingPage.ai.chatMsg2: Yes please! I'm applying to FinFlow's project today.
LandingPage.ai.chatMsg3: Great choice! Here's a tailored version that emphasizes the exact skills they're looking for. I also noticed they value "growth mindset" — let's add a bullet about how you taught yourself SQL in two weeks.
LandingPage.cta.companiesItem1: Post your first project in under 5 minutes
LandingPage.cta.companiesUrgency: Limited spots for launch cohort partners
LandingPage.cta.studentsTitle: Ready to Prove What You Can Do?
LandingPage.cta.studentsItem1: Create your profile and showcase your skills
LandingPage.cta.studentsItem2: Get access to AI-powered career coaching
LandingPage.cta.studentsItem3: Build a reputation that opens doors
LandingPage.cta.universitiesItem2: AI career coaching for all students
LandingPage.disclaimer: Campus2Career facilitates connections between students and companies for project-based engagements. Participation does not guarantee employment, internship offers, or academic credit.
LandingPage.testimonialsDisclaimer: Testimonials represent typical user experiences and may be paraphrased for clarity.

EducationalAdminApplicationPage.title: Partner With Campus2Career | For Universities
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.pageSubt: Empower your students with real-world project experience. Join our network of universities connecting students with corporate partners.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit1: Monitor your students' project applications, acceptances, and completions in real-time from your dashboard.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit2: See which students are actively engaged and identify opportunities to provide career guidance.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit3: Generate reports on student engagement and project completion rates for your institution.
EducationalAdminApplicationPage.benefit4: Send announcements and messages directly to your students through the platform.
